name: AGROAMB PRODALT, S.L.
goal: Our company works in the primary sector, we offer agrarian services to farmers, produces forage from our lands and organic fertilizer from organic waste (recovering nutrients) generated in the primary sector and agrofood-industry. We treat organic waste and animal-by-products with lime to sanitized and made organic soil improvers (from waste to resources) treated to close the loop of our resources, obtaining environment and economic benefits in a rural region.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
- Fertilisers
- Soil improvers
- Waste management
- Environment
- Research and Innovation
- SME
